history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: PSeries_decr_n. qsimpl time: 1 use: PSeries_ext,PSeries_decr_n.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of PSeries_decr_n (PSeries _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of (PSeries_ext _ (fun _ : nat => 0)) (PSeries _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros H. rewrite PSeries_decr_n. rewrite (PSeries_ext _ (fun k => 0)). - rewrite PS_incr_n. simpl. replace (x ^ S n * PSeries (PS_decr_n a (S n)) x) with (x * (x ^ n * PSeries (PS_decr_n a n) x)) by field. rewrite <- PSeries_decr_1 with (a := PS_incr_n a n). + rewrite <- PSeries_scal. simpl. rewrite <- H. rewrite Series_scal_l.
